content.text: I'm tired from working part-time, but my new sneakers are helping!
I would love to have new sneakers! I'm always on my feet at work.
I'm sorry to hear that, what do you do for work?
I work for a large company, and I'm always running around.
That sounds stressful. What do you do to relax?
I like to dance with my dog, and I have a massive collection of foreign films that I watch when I'm stressed.
That sounds like a great way to relax! I love watching foreign films too.
Do you have any favorite foreign films?
I really like the Korean film, Parasite. It was so well-made.
I've heard great things about that movie! I need to check it out.
You definitely should. It's a must-see.
